TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceBase extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 提供將會屬於服務應用程之服務的基底類別。

span.span: Provides a base class for a service that will exist as part of a service application.

summary.span: 當建立新的服務類別時，必須衍生自 。

span.span: must be derived from when creating a new service class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生自服務應用程式中定義您的服務類別時。Derive from when defining your service class in a service application. 實用的服務中的任何覆寫和方法。Any useful service overrides the and methods. 如需其他功能，您可以覆寫和以回應服務狀態變更的特定行為。For additional functionality, you can override and with specific behavior in response to changes in the service state. 服務是長時間執行可執行檔不支援使用者介面，以及不可能在登入的使用者帳戶下執行。A service is a long-running executable that does not support a user interface, and which might not run under the logged-on user account. 服務可以執行而不需要任何使用者的身分登入電腦。The service can run without any user being logged on to the computer. 根據預設，服務會執行系統帳戶不是系統管理員帳戶相同。By default, services run under the System account, which is not the same as the Administrator account. 您無法變更系統帳戶的權限。You cannot change the rights of the System account. 或者，您可以使用來指定服務執行的使用者帳戶。Alternatively, you can use a to specify a user account under which the service will run. 可執行檔可以包含多個服務，但必須包含個別針對每個服務。An executable can contain more than one service but must contain a separate for each service. 執行個體向系統註冊服務。The instance registers the service with the system. 安裝程式也會將事件記錄檔，您可以使用它來記錄服務命令關聯的每個服務。The installer also associates each service with an event log that you can use to record service commands. `main()`函式，可執行檔會定義應執行哪些服務。The `main()` function in the executable defines which services should run. 服務的目前工作目錄是系統目錄，而不是可執行檔所在的目錄。The current working directory of the service is the system directory, not the directory in which the executable is located. 當您啟動服務時，系統會找出可執行檔，並執行該服務，可執行檔中包含的方法。When you start a service, the system locates the executable and runs the method for that service, contained within the executable. 不過，執行服務不是可執行檔相同。However, running the service is not the same as running the executable. 可執行檔只會載入服務。The executable only loads the service. 透過服務控制管理員中存取服務 （例如，啟動和停止）。The service is accessed (for example, started and stopped) through the Service Control Manager. 可執行檔呼叫衍生類別的建構函式的第一次呼叫服務上的啟動。The executable calls the derived class's constructor the first time you call Start on the service. 命令處理方法在只有在建構函式執行之後立即呼叫。The command-handling method is called immediately after the constructor executes. 建構函式就不會執行一次之後第一次載入之後，服務，因此必須將從執行的建構函式所執行之處理。The constructor is not executed again after the first time the service has been loaded, so it is necessary to separate the processing performed by the constructor from that performed by . 可以釋放任何資源應該會在建立。Any resources that can be released by should be created in . 在建構函式中建立資源防止服務之後，再次啟動時，如果正確建立已釋放資源。Creating resources in the constructor prevents them from being created properly if the service is started again after has released the resources. 服務控制管理員 (SCM) 可用來與服務互動。The Service Control Manager (SCM) provides a way to interact with the service. 您可以使用 SCM 將啟動、 停止、 暫停、 繼續或自訂命令至服務。You can use the SCM to pass Start, Stop, Pause, Continue, or custom commands into the service. SCM 會使用值和來判斷服務是否接受停止、 暫停或繼續命令。The SCM uses the values of and to determine whether the service accepts Stop, Pause, or Continue commands. 停止、 暫停和繼續啟用 SCM 的操作功能表才會在中對應的屬性或是是`true`服務類別中。Stop, Pause, and Continue are enabled in the SCM's context menus only if the corresponding property or is `true` in the service class. 如果啟用，要將命令傳遞至服務，並， ，或呼叫。If enabled, the command is passed to the service, and , , or is called. 如果， ，或是`false`，對應的命令處理方法 (例如) 將不會處理，即使您已實作的方法。If , , or is `false`, the corresponding command-handling method (such as ) will not be processed, even if you have implemented the method. 您可以使用類別來以程式設計方式執行何種 SCM 未使用的使用者介面。You can use the class to do programmatically what the SCM does using a user interface. 您可以自動化在主控台中可用的工作。You can automate the tasks available in the console. 如果， ，或是`true`但尚未實作對應的命令處理方法 (例如) 系統就會擲回例外狀況，並忽略命令。If , , or is `true` but you have not implemented a corresponding command-handling method (such as ) the system throws an exception and ignores the command. 您不必實作， ，或任何其他方法在。You do not have to implement , , or any other method in . 不過中, 所述的服務行為，因此最小值，這個成員應該覆寫。However, the service's behavior is described in , so at minimum, this member should be overridden. `main()`函式的可執行檔可執行檔和服務控制管理員中註冊服務，藉由呼叫方法。The `main()` function of the executable registers the service in the executable with the Service Control Manager by calling the method. 的屬性物件傳遞給方法必須符合該服務之服務安裝程式的屬性。The property of the object passed to the method must match the property of the service installer for that service. 您可以使用`InstallUtil.exe`在您的系統上安裝服務。You can use `InstallUtil.exe` to install services on your system. > [!NOTE] > 您可以指定應用程式事件記錄檔，以接收通知的服務呼叫，但兩者皆非的記錄檔和屬性可以寫入自訂記錄檔。You can specify a log other than the Application event log to receive notification of service calls, but neither the nor the property can write to a custom log. 設定至`false`如果不想使用自動記錄。Set to `false` if you do not want to use automatic logging.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法建立的執行個體類別。Do not create an instance of the class. 相反地，衍生自和具現化衍生的類別。Instead, derive from and instantiate your derived class. 您需要實作建構函式的類別繼承自最小是設定在您的元件。The minimum you need to implement in the constructor for a class inherited from is to set the on your component. 沒有其他處理程序特別需要建構函式。No other processing is specifically required in the constructor. 您應該處理中的大部分初始化而不是在建構函式。You should handle most initialization in rather than in the constructor. 否則，就無法保證當您重新啟動服務已停止後，將重新初始化的物件。Otherwise, there is no guarantee the objects will be reinitialized when you restart a service after it has been stopped. 如果衍生類別中覆寫建構函式，請在您的程式碼中呼叫基底類別建構函式。If you override the constructor in your derived class, call the base class constructor in your code. 建構函式至`true`。The constructor sets to `true`. 如果您不想自動登入服務呼叫從服務控制管理員 (SCM)，設定至`false`。If you do not want to automatically log calls to the service from the Service Control Manager (SCM), set to `false`. 如果可執行檔包含單一服務，系統就會呼叫服務的建構函式時開始選取 scm，和呼叫停止，則會執行解構函式。If the executable contains a single service, the system calls the service's constructor when Start is selected from the SCM, and runs the destructor if Stop is called. 如果可執行檔包含多個服務，呼叫開始於一項服務會導致所要呼叫的可執行檔中的所有服務的建構函式，但指定的服務已啟動。If the executable contains multiple services, calling Start on one service causes the constructors to be called for all services in the executable, but only the specified service is started. 當所有的服務已停止，不個別停止每個服務時，會一起執行解構函式的服務。Destructors for the services are run together when all services have been stopped, not individually when each service is stopped. > [!NOTE] > 如果您覆寫基底類別建構函式，您應該在您的衍生類別的建構函式中明確呼叫它。If you override the base class constructor, you should explicitly call it in the constructor of your derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoLog { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoLog : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指示是否在事件記錄檔中報告啟動、停止、暫停和繼續等命令。

span.span: Indicates whether to report Start, Stop, Pause, and Continue commands in the event log.

value.span: 若要在事件記錄檔中報告資訊，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to report information in the event log; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至`true`指示要用於報表的命令失敗，以及狀態變更資訊的應用程式事件記錄檔開始、 停止、 暫停和繼續事件，在服務上的服務。Setting to `true` instructs the service to use the Application event log to report command failures, as well as state change information for Start, Stop, Pause, and Continue events on the service. 服務的名稱做為記錄檔的。The name of the service is used as the log's . 若要報告自訂事件記錄檔，而不是應用程式記錄檔的資訊，請設定來`false`和寫入命令處理方法中的指示， ，或張貼至適當的記錄檔。To report information to a custom event log rather than the Application log, set to `false` and write instructions within the command-handling methods , , or to post to the appropriate log. > [!NOTE] > ，提供事件記錄檔的來源字串之前，必須設定服務會嘗試寫入事件記錄檔。The , which supplies the source string for the event log, must be set before the service attempts to write to the event log. 嘗試存取事件記錄檔，就會設定來源的名稱，就會擲回例外狀況。Trying to access the event log before the source name is set throws an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanHandlePowerEvent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanHandlePowerEvent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出服務是否可以處理電腦電源狀態變更時發生的告知。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service can handle notifications of computer power status changes.

value.span: 如果服務處理 類別中所指示的電腦電源狀態變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the service handles the computer power status changes indicated in the class, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當電腦的電源狀態變更，服務控制管理員 (SCM) 確認服務是否接受電源事件的命令使用的值。When the computer power status changes, the Service Control Manager (SCM) verifies whether the service accepts power event commands using the value of . 如果是`true`，此命令傳遞至服務和如果定義會呼叫方法。If is `true`, the command is passed to the service and the method is called if defined. 如果未實作在衍生類別中，SCM 處理電源事件，透過空的基底類別方法。If is not implemented in the derived class, the SCM handles the power event through the empty base class method.

exception.span: 這個屬性在服務啟動之後被修改。

span.span: This property is modified after the service was started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanHandleSessionChangeEvent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanHandleSessionChangeEvent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出服務是否可以處理從 Terminal Server 工作階段所擷取的工作階段變更事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the service can handle session change events received from a Terminal Server session.

value.span: 如果服務可以處理 Terminal Server 工作階段的變更事件則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the service can handle Terminal Server session change events; otherwise, .

exception.span: 這個屬性在服務啟動之後被修改。

span.span: This property is modified after the service was started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanPauseAndContinue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanPauseAndContinue : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出服務是否可以暫停和繼續。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service can be paused and resumed.

value.span: 如果服務可以暫停，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the service can be paused; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值設定服務建構函式中的屬性。Set the value of the property in the constructor for the service. 服務暫停時，它會中止它正在進行。When a service is paused, it halts what it is doing. 當您繼續執行服務 （無論是透過服務控制管理員中或以程式設計的方式），執行。When you continue the service (either through the Service Control Manager or programmatically), runs. 暫停要求傳送至服務，可以節省系統資源。Sending a Pause request to the service can conserve system resources. 暫停可能不會發行所有系統資源，但停止。Pause may not release all system resources, but Stop does. 並通常會實作來執行較少處理會比和。 and are often implemented to perform less processing than and . 當是`true`，覆寫和來指定應該在服務控制管理員 (SCM) 傳送暫停或繼續要求到您的服務時所發生的處理。When is `true`, override and to specify the processing that should occur when the Service Control Manager (SCM) passes a Pause or Continue request to your service. 若要復原中的處理應該實作。 should be implemented to undo the processing in . 如果已`false`、 SCM 將無法通過暫停或繼續服務要求，因此和即使它們在實作時，就不會呼叫方法。If is `false`, the SCM will not pass Pause or Continue requests to the service, so the and methods will not be called even if they are implemented. SCM 中,`Pause`並`Continue`已停用控制項時是`false`。In the SCM, the `Pause` and `Continue` controls are disabled when is `false`.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 一旦已經啟動服務，就無法變更 屬性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanShutdown { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanShutdown : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當系統關閉時是否應該通知服務。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service should be notified when the system is shutting down.

value.span: 如果當系統關閉時應該通知服務，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the service should be notified when the system is shutting down; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，當系統關閉時，通知服務。If is `true`, the service is notified when the system is shutting down. 在關機，如果衍生類別中實作會呼叫方法。At shutdown, the method is called if it has been implemented in your derived class. > [!NOTE] > 只有系統應該會造成方法來執行; 服務可以呼叫它，但不是建議這麼做。Only the system should cause the method to execute; the service can call it, but this is not recommended.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 一旦已經啟動服務，就無法變更 屬性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CanStop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanStop : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出一旦服務已經啟動是否可以停止它。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service can be stopped once it has started.

value.span: 如果可以停止服務並且呼叫 方法，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the service can be stopped and the method called; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在服務上呼叫時停止，服務控制管理員 (SCM) 會確認服務是否接受停止命令，使用值。When Stop is called on a service, the Service Control Manager (SCM) verifies whether the service accepts Stop commands using the value of . 大部分的服務，windows 7是`true`，但某些作業系統服務，例如，不允許使用者停止它們。For most services, the value of is `true`, but some operating system services, for example, do not allow the user to stop them. 如果已`true`，[停止] 命令傳遞至服務和如果已定義，會呼叫方法。If is `true`, the Stop command is passed to the service and the method is called if it is defined. 如果未實作在衍生類別中，透過空的基底類別的 Stop 命令的 SCM 控點方法。If is not implemented in the derived class, the SCM handles the Stop command through the empty base class method.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 一旦已經啟動服務，就無法變更 屬性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 處置 (Dispose) 所使用的資源 (除了記憶體之外)。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫衍生類別中 (並透過它在類別) 當您完成使用衍生的類別。Call in your derived class (and through it, in the class) when you are finished using the derived class. 方法讓衍生的類別中無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the derived class in an unusable state. 之後呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考衍生的類別和讓它們所佔用的記憶體可以回收記憶體回收。After calling , you must release all references to the derived class and so the memory they were occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 請務必呼叫發行類別衍生自您最後一個參考之前。Always call before you release your last reference to the class derived from . 否則，資源而衍生的類別使用會不會釋放記憶體回收會呼叫物件的解構函式之前。Otherwise, the resources and the derived class are using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the objects' destructors. 通常實作處理中的程式碼呼叫合併。 is often implemented to process the code in , combined with a call to . 如果您選擇在您的衍生類別中這麼做，是實作慣用配置任何發行。If you choose to do this in your derived class, it is customary to implement to allocate whatever released.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property EventLog As EventLog
public: virtual property System::Diagnostics::EventLog ^ EventLog { System::Diagnostics::EventLog ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得事件記錄檔，您可以利用該事件記錄將服務命令呼叫 (例如啟動和停止) 通知寫入應用程式事件記錄檔。

span.span: Gets an event log you can use to write notification of service command calls, such as Start and Stop, to the Application event log.

value.span: 執行個體，其來源是登錄到應用程式記錄檔。

span.span: An instance whose source is registered to the Application log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化屬性的執行個體，但和屬性集。The constructor initializes the property to an instance with the and properties set. 來源是的服務，並已在電腦的應用程式記錄檔的記錄檔。The source is the of the service, and the log is the computer's Application log. 這些值會自動設定，而且不能變更自動記錄服務命令。These values are set automatically and cannot be changed for automatic logging of service commands. 當是`true`，啟動、 停止、 暫停、 繼續、 和自訂命令會自動記錄應用程式事件記錄檔中。When is `true`, Start, Stop, Pause, Continue, and custom commands are recorded automatically in the Application event log. 您可以使用屬性，以寫入該記錄檔中的其他訊息。You can use the property to write additional messages to that log as well. 此元件會呼叫使用此成員。The component calls using this member. 若要報告自訂事件記錄檔，而不是應用程式記錄檔的資訊，請設定來`false`和寫入命令處理方法中的指示， ，或張貼至適當的記錄檔。To report information to a custom event log rather than the Application log, set to `false` and write instructions within the command-handling methods , , or to post to the appropriate log.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ExitCode { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ExitCode : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定服務的結束代碼 (Exit Code)。

span.span: Gets or sets the exit code for the service.
The exit code for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性設為非零值之前停止服務，以指出服務控制管理員發生錯誤。Set the property to a non-zero value before stopping the service to indicate an error to the Service Control Manager.

summary.span: 指示服務名稱的最大值。

span.span: Indicates the maximum size for a service name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ServiceName 和 DisplayName 兩者都有您的服務類別上設定屬性時，必須遵守的大小限制。ServiceName and DisplayName both have size restrictions that must be observed when setting the properties on your service class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnContinue() cil managed
abstract member OnContinue : unit -> unit override this.OnContinue : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，當服務控制管理員 (SCM) 傳送繼續命令給服務時，將執行 。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, runs when a Continue command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM).

summary.span: 指定暫停服務後要繼續正常運作所要執行的動作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a service resumes normal functioning after being paused.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作來鏡像您的應用程式回應。Implement to mirror your application's response to . 當您繼續執行服務 （無論是透過 [服務] 主控台或以程式設計方式），處理執行時，與服務再次變成作用中。When you continue the service (either through the Services console or programmatically), the processing runs, and the service becomes active again. 應該覆寫，當屬性是`true`。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`. 如果已`false`、 SCM 將無法通過暫停或繼續服務要求，因此和即使它們在實作時，就不會呼叫方法。If is `false`, the SCM will not pass Pause or Continue requests to the service, so the and methods will not be called even if they are implemented. SCM 中,`Pause`並`Continue`已停用控制項時是`false`。In the SCM, the `Pause` and `Continue` controls are disabled when is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCustomCommand(int32 command) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnCustomCommand (command As Integer)
abstract member OnCustomCommand : int -> unit override this.OnCustomCommand : int -> unit

param.name: command
param.span: 傳送至服務的命令訊息。

span.span: The command message sent to the service.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，當服務控制管理員 (SCM) 傳遞自訂命令給服務時，將執行 。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when the Service Control Manager (SCM) passes a custom command to the service.

summary.span: 指定在具有指定參數值的命令發生時所要執行的動作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a command with the specified parameter value occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您指定啟動、 停止、 暫停和繼續服務以外的其他功能。 lets you specify additional functionality beyond starting, stopping, pausing and continuing services. SCM 不會檢查以確認服務是否支援自訂命令`command`傳入參數。The SCM does not examine the custom command to verify whether the service supports the `command` parameter passed in. 它的自訂命令直接傳送至服務。It passes the custom command directly to the service. 如果服務無法辨識`command`參數，它不執行任何動作。If the service does not recognize the `command` parameter, it does nothing. 自訂命令會引發中的陳述式元件。Custom commands are raised by an statement in a component. 使用 switch 陳述式或 if...然後條件，以處理您在您的服務定義的自訂命令。Use a switch statement or if..then condition to handle the custom commands you define on your service. 您可以在您的應用程式中定義，或使用中的自訂命令的唯一值是 128 到 255 之間。The only values for a custom command that you can define in your application or use in are those between 128 and 255. 以下 128 的整數會對應至系統保留的值。Integers below 128 correspond to system-reserved values. 如果屬性是`true`，自訂的命令，例如所有其他命令，將項目寫入事件記錄檔，以報告方法執行成功還是失敗。If the property is `true`, custom commands, like all other commands, write entries to the event log to report whether the method execution succeeded or failed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPause() cil managed
abstract member OnPause : unit -> unit override this.OnPause : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，當服務控制管理員 (SCM) 傳送暫停命令至服務時執行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when a Pause command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM).

summary.span: 指定在服務暫停時所要執行的動作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a service pauses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來指定當服務接收到縸懫暀硉時發生的處理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the service receives a Pause command. 應該覆寫，當屬性是`true`。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`. 當您繼續已暫停的服務 （無論是透過 [服務] 主控台或以程式設計方式），執行處理，以及服務再次變為無法使用。When you continue a paused service (either through the Services console or programmatically), the processing is run, and the service becomes active again. 縸懫暀硉只允許您的應用程式，以回應特定事件。The Pause command only allows your application to react to a specific event. 沒有任何未定義其執行的服務。 does nothing to the service that you do not define it to do. 暫停要求傳送至服務可以節省系統資源，因為暫停必須釋放所有的系統資源。Sending a Pause request to the service can conserve system resources because Pause need not release all system resources. 例如，如果執行緒已開啟的處理程序，暫停服務，而不是將其停止，可以讓執行緒保持開啟，因此不需要時，服務會繼續重新配置。For example, if threads have been opened by the process, pausing a service rather than stopping it can allow the threads to remain open, obviating the need to reallocate them when the service continues. 如果您定義要釋放所有系統資源的暫停時，它就停止命令。If you define Pause to release all system resources, it behaves like a Stop command. 設定要`true`，並覆寫和來指定當 SCM 將暫停或繼續要求傳遞至您的服務時，應該會發生的處理。Set to `true`, and override and to specify the processing that should occur when the SCM passes a Pause or Continue request to your service. 若要復原中的處理應該實作。 should be implemented to undo the processing in . 如果已`false`、 SCM 將無法通過暫停或繼續服務要求，因此和即使實作，就不會呼叫方法。If is `false`, the SCM will not pass Pause or Continue requests to the service, so the and methods will not be called even if implemented. SCM 中,`Pause`並`Continue`已停用控制項時是`false`。In the SCM, the `Pause` and `Continue` controls are disabled when is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnPowerEvent(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus powerStatus) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function OnPowerEvent (powerStatus As PowerBroadcastStatus) As Boolean
abstract member OnPowerEvent : System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus -> bool override this.OnPowerEvent : System.ServiceProcess.PowerBroadcastStatus -> bool

param.name: powerStatus
param.span: ，表示來自系統關於電源狀態的通知。

span.span: A that indicates a notification from the system about its power status.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，當電腦的電源狀態已經變更時執行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when the computer's power status has changed.

summary.span: 這適用於攜帶型電腦，當它們進入暫停模式的時候，不同於系統關閉。

span.span: This applies to laptop computers when they go into suspended mode, which is not the same as a system shutdown.

returns.span: 當在衍生類別中實作時，您的應用程式之需求會決定將傳回什麼值。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, the needs of your application determine what value to return.

returns.span: 例如，如果傳遞 廣播狀態，您可能會導致您的應用程式傳回 來拒絕查詢。

span.span: For example, if a broadcast status is passed, you could cause your application to reject the query by returning .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定的處理序時的系統事件中指出列舉型別，就會發生-例如，在電腦放在暫停模式，或指出電力偏低時。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the system event indicated in the enumeration occurs--for example, when the computer is placed in suspended mode or indicates low battery power. 應該覆寫，當屬性是`true`。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSessionChange(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription changeDescription) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnSessionChange (changeDescription As SessionChangeDescription)
abstract member OnSessionChange : System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription -> unit override this.OnSessionChange : System.ServiceProcess.SessionChangeDescription -> unit

span.span: A structure that identifies the change type.

summary.span: 當從 Terminal Server 工作階段接收到變更事件時執行。

span.span: Executes when a change event is received from a Terminal Server session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須設定屬性設`true`才能執行此方法。You must set the property to `true` to enable the execution of this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnShutdown() cil managed
abstract member OnShutdown : unit -> unit override this.OnShutdown : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，當系統正在關閉時執行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when the system is shutting down.

summary.span: 指定緊接在系統關閉之前應該發生的處理。

span.span: Specifies what should occur immediately prior to the system shutting down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定發生於系統關閉時的處理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the system shuts down. 只有在作業系統關機，不會在關閉電腦時，才，就會發生此事件。This event occurs only when the operating system is shut down, not when the computer is turned off. 應該覆寫，當屬性是`true`。 is expected to be overridden when the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStart(string[] args) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnStart (args As String())
abstract member OnStart : string[] -> unit override this.OnStart : string[] -> unit

param.name: args
param.span: 啟動命令所傳遞的資料。

span.span: Data passed by the start command.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，當服務控制管理員 (SCM) 傳送啟動命令至服務或當作業系統啟動 (自動啟動服務) 時執行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when a Start command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM) or when the operating system starts (for a service that starts automatically).

summary.span: 指定在服務啟動時所要執行的動作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when the service starts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來指定當服務收到 Start 命令，就會發生的處理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the service receives a Start command. 是您可以在其中指定服務行為的方法。 is the method in which you specify the behavior of the service. 可以接受引數來傳遞資料，但這種使用方式很少見。 can take arguments as a way to pass data, but this usage is rare. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿使用建構函式來執行處理，應為。Do not use the constructor to perform processing that should be in . 使用來處理您的服務的所有初始設定。Use to handle all initialization of your service. 應用程式的可執行檔時，會呼叫建構函式執行時，不在執行服務時。The constructor is called when the application's executable runs, not when the service runs. 可執行檔執行之前。The executable runs before . 當您要繼續，比方說，建構函式不會再次呼叫因為 SCM 已存有物件在記憶體中。When you continue, for example, the constructor is not called again because the SCM already holds the object in memory. 如果釋放配置的建構函式而不是在資源，所需的資源不會建立一次呼叫服務時的第二個時間。If releases resources allocated in the constructor rather than in , the needed resources would not be created again the second time the service is called. 服務可以設定為自動啟動時重新啟動電腦藉由設定服務的安裝程式，以在。Services can be set to start automatically when the computer reboots by setting the on the service's installer to . 在這種情況下，會在系統啟動時呼叫。In such a situation, would be called at system startup. 要在衍生類別中被覆寫。 is expected to be overridden in the derived class. 服務會很實用和應該兩者在實作您的服務類別。For the service to be useful, and should both be implemented in your service class. 處理初始化引數中的服務方法中的，Main 方法中找不到。Process initialization arguments for the service in the method, not in the Main method. 中的引數`args`可以手動設定參數陣列，在 [屬性] 視窗的 [服務] 主控台中的服務。The arguments in the `args` parameter array can be set manually in the properties window for the service in the Services console. 此外，不會儲存在主控台中輸入的引數;它們會傳遞至服務一次從控制台啟動服務時。The arguments entered in the console are not saved; they are passed to the service on a one-time basis when the service is started from the control panel. 必須的存在，服務會自動啟動的引數可以放在服務的登錄機碼的 ImagePath 字串值 (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\ * \<服務名稱 >*)。Arguments that must be present when the service is automatically started can be placed in the ImagePath string value for the service's registry key (HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\*). 您可以從登錄使用來取得引數方法，例如： `string[] imagePathArgs = Environment.GetCommandLineArgs();`。You can obtain the arguments from the registry using the method, for example: `string[] imagePathArgs = Environment.GetCommandLineArgs();`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnStop() cil managed
abstract member OnStop : unit -> unit override this.OnStop : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在衍生類別中實作時，當服務控制管理員 (SCM) 傳送停止命令至服務時執行。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, executes when a Stop command is sent to the service by the Service Control Manager (SCM).

summary.span: 指定在服務停止執行時所要執行的動作。

span.span: Specifies actions to take when a service stops running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用來指定當服務收到 Stop 命令，就會發生的處理。Use to specify the processing that occurs when the service receives a Stop command. 當 SCM 收到 Stop 命令時，它會使用值若要確認服務是否接受停止命令。When the SCM receives a Stop command, it uses the value of to verify whether the service accepts Stop commands. 如果是`true`，[停止] 命令傳遞至服務，而如果已定義，會呼叫方法。If is `true`, the Stop command is passed to the service, and the method is called if it is defined. 如果未實作在服務中，SCM 處理 [停止] 命令。If is not implemented in the service, the SCM handles the Stop command. 如果是`false`，SCM 會忽略 [停止] 命令。If is `false`, the SCM ignores the Stop command. 它不會傳遞給服務。It is not passed to the service. [停止] 命令會傳回，則擲回例外狀況。The Stop command returns and throws an exception. 要在衍生類別中被覆寫。 is expected to be overridden in the derived class. 服務會很實用和應該兩者在實作您的服務類別。For the service to be useful, and should both be implemented in your service class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RequestAdditionalTime(int32 milliseconds) cil managed

param.name: milliseconds
param.span: 以毫秒為單位的要求時間。

span.span: The requested time in milliseconds.

summary.span: 要求額外時間進行暫止的運算。

span.span: Requests additional time for a pending operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是呼叫所覆寫， ， ，或方法來要求更多的時間暫止的作業，以防止標記中的服務控制管理員 (SCM)為沒有回應的服務。The method is intended to be called by the overridden , , , or methods to request additional time for a pending operation, to prevent the Service Control Manager (SCM) from marking the service as not responding. 如果暫止的作業不是繼續、 暫停、 啟動或停止就會擲回。If the pending operation is not a continue, pause, start, or stop, an is thrown.

span.span: The service is not in a pending state.

summary.span: 提供服務可執行檔的主要進入點。

span.span: Provides the main entry point for a service executable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Run(class System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase service) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Run (service As ServiceBase)

span.span: A which indicates a service to start.

summary.span: 使用服務控制管理員 (SCM) 登錄服務的可執行檔。

span.span: Registers the executable for a service with the Service Control Manager (SCM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個多載`main()`函式可註冊服務和服務控制管理員中執行的服務。Call this overload in the `main()` function of the service executable to register the service with the Service Control Manager. 在您呼叫後，服務控制管理員發出啟動命令，會導致呼叫服務中的方法。After you call , the Service Control Manager issues a Start command, which results in a call to the method in the service. Start 命令執行之前，不會啟動服務。The service is not started until the Start command is executed. 方法會呼叫在相同的方式為Windows Form 應用程式。The method is called in much the same way as for Windows Forms applications. 如果已`true`，將項目寫入事件記錄檔所指定的服務如果`service`參數無法啟動。If is `true`, an entry is written to the event log if the service specified by the `service` parameter fails to start.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Run(class System.ServiceProcess.ServiceBase[] services) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Run (services As ServiceBase())

param.name: services
param.span: ServiceBase 執行個體的陣列，表示要啟動的服務。

span.span: An array of ServiceBase instances, which indicate services to start.

summary.span: 使用服務控制管理員 (SCM) 登錄多個服務的可執行檔。

span.span: Registers the executable for multiple services with the Service Control Manager (SCM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個多載`main()`服務可執行檔，註冊服務和服務控制管理員中的功能。Call this overload in the `main()` function of the service executable to register the services with the Service Control Manager. 在您呼叫後，服務控制管理員，以發出啟動命令，呼叫會導致服務中的方法。After you call , the Service Control Manager issues Start commands, which result in calls to the methods in the services. 服務無法啟動之前啟動命令會執行。The services are not started until the Start commands are executed. 方法會呼叫在相同的方式為Windows Form 應用程式的方法。The method is called in much the same way as the method for Windows Forms applications. 如果是`true`，項目寫入事件記錄檔，如果陣列中的任何服務無法啟動。If is `true`, an entry is written to the event log if any service in the array fails to start.

exception.span: 您不提供要啟動的服務。

span.span: You did not supply a service to start.

exception.span: 陣列可能為 或空白。

span.span: The array might be or empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ServiceHandle As IntPtr
protected: property IntPtr ServiceHandle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 取得服務的服務控制處理。

span.span: Gets the service control handle for the service.

value.span: 包含服務之服務控制處理的 結構。

span.span: An structure that contains the service control handle for the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務控制處理用來通訊的服務控制管理員 (SCM)。The service control handle is used to communicate with the Service Control Manager (SCM). 控制代碼可用來更新使用未受管理的呼叫服務的服務控制管理員的狀態資訊`SetServiceStatus`函式。The handle can be used to update the service control manager's status information for the calling service using the unmanaged `SetServiceStatus` function.

permission.span: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: for access to unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration: .

summary.span: 登錄命令處理常式 (Command Handler) 並啟動服務。

span.span: Registers the command handler and starts the service.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ServiceName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ServiceName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定用來識別系統服務的簡短名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the short name used to identify the service to the system.
The name of the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 識別到服務控制管理員中的服務。The identifies the service to the Service Control Manager. 這個屬性的值必須是記錄中的服務的名稱與相同相對應的安裝程式類別的屬性。The value of this property must be identical to the name recorded for the service in the property of the corresponding installer class. 程式碼中，的服務通常會設定`main()`函式的可執行檔。In code, the of the service is usually set in the `main()` function of the executable. 也用來指定聯屬性。The is also used to specify the associated with the property. 這是服務命令資訊寫入應用程式記錄檔的執行個體。This is an instance that writes service command information to the Application log. ，提供事件記錄檔的來源字串必須設為服務寫入事件記錄檔。The , which supplies the source string for the event log, must be set before the service writes to the event log. 嘗試存取事件記錄檔，就會設定來源的名稱，會導致擲回例外狀況。Trying to access the event log before the source name is set causes an exception to be thrown.

span.span: The service has already been started.

exception.span: 一旦已經啟動服務，就無法變更 屬性。

span.span: The property cannot be changed once the service has started.

exception.span: 指定的名稱是零長度字串或比 更長，或者指定的名稱包含斜線或反斜線字元。

span.span: The specified name is a zero-length string or is longer than , or the specified name contains forward slash or backslash characters.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止執行中的服務。

span.span: Stops the executing service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定服務狀態，以指出停止暫止和呼叫方法。The method sets the service state to indicate a stop is pending and calls the method. 停止應用程式之後，服務的狀態設定為停止。After the application is stopped, the service state is set to stopped. 如果裝載的服務應用程式，應用程式定義域會卸載。If the application is a hosted service, the application domain is unloaded.
